mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN m_fixed_value F0021 ON mm.msg_type = F0021.value AND F0021.code = 'F0021'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(mm.id) FROM m_message mm WHERE 1=1
SELECT COUNT(mm.id) FROM m_message mm WHERE mm.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR mm.user_id is null

SELECT COUNT(main.id) FROM ( SELECT mm.id, case when mr.id is null then false else true end AS readSts FROM m_message mm LEFT JOIN m_message_read mr ON mm.id = mr.id WHERE mm.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR mm.user_id is null ) AS main WHERE main.readSts = false

SELECT , mr.id AS mr_id, mr.user_id AS mr_user_id, case when mr.id is null then false else true end AS readSts FROM m_message mm
LEFT JOIN m_message_read mr ON mm.id = mr.id WHERE mm.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR mm.user_id is null ORDER BY readSts, mm.regist_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
SELECT mr.id AS mr_id, mr.user_id AS mr_user_id FROM m_message_read mr WHERE mr.user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR} AND mr.id = #{msgId, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}
